trans-unit.source: Wraps an XML <xref uid="langword_csharp_language" name="language" href=""></xref> type.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapLanguage"></xref> class with the language identifier value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_language" name="language" href=""></xref> attribute.

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Retourneert de XML-Schema definition language (XSD) van het huidige SOAP-type.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that indicates the XSD of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref:System.String>die aangeeft dat de XSD van het huidige SOAP-type.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref:System.String> into a <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapLanguage"></xref> object.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> to convert.
A object that is obtained from value.

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
